articles.title: "Palpably Slow": Sunil Gavaskar Not Pleased With Rohit Sharma's Footwork - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Rohit Sharma was dismissed for a duck in India's opening Cricket World Cup 2023 clash against Australia.
articles.content: India captain Rohit Sharma had a bizarre start to the Cricket World Cup 2023 that saw him dismissed for a duck against Australia. It wasn't just Rohit but fellow opening batter Ishan Kishan and middl… [+1569 chars]
